00022 #region Usings
00023 using System;
00024 using System.Text;
00025 using System.Xml;
00026 #endregion
00027 
00028 namespace Utilities.FileFormats.OPMLHelper
00029 {
00033     public class OPML
00034     {
00035         #region Constructors
00036 
00037 
00038 
00039         public OPML()
00040         {
00041 
00042         }
00043 
00048         public OPML(string Location)
00049         {
00050             try
00051             {
00052                 XmlDocument Document = new XmlDocument();
00053                 Document.Load(Location);
00054                 foreach (XmlNode Children in Document.ChildNodes)
00055                 {
00056                     if (Children.Name.Equals("opml", StringComparison.CurrentCultureIgnoreCase))
00057                     {
00058                         foreach (XmlNode Child in Children.ChildNodes)
00059                         {
00060                             if (Child.Name.Equals("body", StringComparison.CurrentCultureIgnoreCase))
00061                             {
00062                                 Body = new Body((XmlElement)Child);
00063                             }
00064                             else if (Child.Name.Equals("head", StringComparison.CurrentCultureIgnoreCase))
00065                             {
00066                                 Head = new Head((XmlElement)Child);
00067                             }
00068                         }
00069                     }
00070                 }
00071             }
00072             catch { throw; }
00073         }
00074 
00079         public OPML(XmlDocument Document)
00080         {
00081             try
00082             {
00083                 foreach (XmlNode Children in Document.ChildNodes)
00084                 {
00085                     if (Children.Name.Equals("opml", StringComparison.CurrentCultureIgnoreCase))
00086                     {
00087                         foreach (XmlNode Child in Children.ChildNodes)
00088                         {
00089                             if (Child.Name.Equals("body", StringComparison.CurrentCultureIgnoreCase))
00090                             {
00091                                 Body = new Body((XmlElement)Child);
00092                             }
00093                             else if (Child.Name.Equals("head", StringComparison.CurrentCultureIgnoreCase))
00094                             {
00095                                 Head = new Head((XmlElement)Child);
00096                             }
00097                         }
00098                     }
00099                 }
00100             }
00101             catch { throw; }
00102         }
00103         #endregion
00104 
00105         #region Properties
00106 
00110         public Body Body{get;set;}
00111 
00115         public Head Head { get; set; }
00116 
00117         #endregion
00118 
00119         #region Overridden Functions
00120         public override string ToString()
00121         {
00122             try
00123             {
00124                 StringBuilder OPMLString = new StringBuilder();
00125                 OPMLString.Append("<?xml version=\"1.0\" encoding=\"ISO-8859-1\"?><opml version=\"2.0\">");
00126                 OPMLString.Append(Head.ToString());
00127                 OPMLString.Append(Body.ToString());
00128                 OPMLString.Append("</opml>");
00129                 return OPMLString.ToString();
00130             }
00131             catch { throw; }
00132         }
00133         #endregion
00134     }
00135 }
